hero.title: Experiences That Make Your Stay Special
hero.subtitle: From peaceful moments in nature to outdoor activities full of energy, Panorama Resort offers something for everyone to enjoy.

activitiesSection.title: Explore Our Activities
activitiesSection.subtitle: Whether you're here to unwind or explore, our range of activities is designed to make every moment unforgettable.

activities.name: Outdoor Pool with Nature & City Views
activities.description: Cool off and unwind in our outdoor pool, where the calm of nature meets panoramic views of Elbasan.
activities.longDescription: Spacious and surrounded by greenery, our pool is the perfect place to relax under the sun. Whether you're enjoying a quiet swim or simply lounging poolside, the views stretch across the hills and the city below. A separate children's area makes it family-friendly, and in the evening, the pool glows under warm lighting — creating a serene setting for a sunset or night swim.

activities.name: Sauna & Relaxation
activities.longDescription: Our cozy sauna is the perfect place to unwind, improve circulation, and enjoy a deep sense of calm. Ideal before or after a swim, or simply as a moment of personal peace.

activities.name: Horse Riding
activities.description: A Unique Experience, Right at the Resort
activities.longDescription: Enjoy the charm of horse riding in a dedicated space within Panorama Resort. It's a calm, enjoyable activity suitable for all ages — no experience needed, just a love for nature and animals.

activities.name: Indoor Swimming Pool
activities.description: Cool off and unwind in our indoor pool, perfect for relaxation regardless of the weather outside.
activities.longDescription: Spacious and surrounded by greenery, our indoor pool is the perfect place to relax in any weather. Whether you're enjoying a quiet swim or simply lounging poolside, the atmosphere is always comfortable and inviting. A separate children's area makes it family-friendly, and the pool is beautifully illuminated, creating a serene setting for a relaxing swim any time of day.

activities.name: Hiking
activities.description: Explore the beautiful natural surroundings of Panorama Resort with guided hiking tours.
activities.longDescription: Embrace the natural beauty surrounding our resort with our guided hiking tours. Our experienced guides will lead you through scenic trails that showcase the region's diverse flora and fauna. Trails are available for all skill levels, from gentle walks to more challenging hikes. Equipment and refreshments are provided, ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable experience. Discover hidden viewpoints and capture breathtaking panoramas of the Albanian landscape.
activities.hours: Tours depart at 9:00 AM and 2:00 PM daily
